benchmark_details.name: Essay-Syntax-Instruct
benchmark_details.overview: The Essay-Syntax-Instruct dataset is designed to enhance the understanding and application of English syntax among students by providing automated syntax feedback, leveraging LLMs to improve students' syntactic proficiency.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve students' syntactic skills by providing automated feedback on written essays.

data.source: ASAP Dataset combined with essays written by students across various prompts.
data.annotation: Feedback generated by LLMs and evaluated by linguistic experts.

methodology.calculation: ROUGE scores calculated between generated feedback and human annotations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ROUGE scores indicate better alignment between generated feedback and quality of responses.
methodology.baseline_results: Feedback was evaluated qualitatively using a five-tier rating scale.
methodology.validation: Qualitative evaluation by linguistic experts and quantitative analysis via ROUGE scores.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Anonymization of student data was implemented using NER tools.
